Name: Bitcoin Farm
About the game: Become the new king of cryptocurrency! Bitcoin Farm is a clicker game where you will aim to undermine a maximum of Bitcoins! To get there you will first mine Bitcoins with your mouse, then later buy graphics cards or asic miner to mine without doing anything! Features : ■ Pretty decorations! ■ A Bitcoin / Dollar converter! ■ Graphic card shop and asic miner! ■ Background shop! ■ Good music!
Meta Title: Bitcoin Farm: Jan 19, 2018, RewindApp and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Bitcoin Farm? Check out the release date (Jan 19, 2018), developer insights from RewindApp, and a complete game summary.
